column4: Gots a prob.....  I just managed to get Dapper alternative up and running on a new box using alternate
the machine is running amd 64 dual core proc

I just downloaded and installed the upgrades that Dapper told me to get and as soon as I closed the window after installation The puter shut down and is now busy turning itself off and on again over and over????
I don't know if this will help you, but that happened to me once and I pulled out the memory, booted, and put the memory back in to fix it.
